game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an invaluable artifact is buried within a forgotten ruin. The quest giver, Arinthea, needs your help to recover it.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Ask locals for information about the ruins and find its hidden entrance.
Beware of traps and avoid hostile creatures while searching for the artifact.
